response.original_title: The True Quest for Fabled Treasure on the Oregon Coast
response.overview: The allure of lost treasure on the Northwest coast of Oregon goes back much further than 1985. In fact, the hunt for hidden coastal riches has been a defining feature of the Beaver state since its earliest days. Driven by a heady mixture of indigenous eyewitness accounts of shipwrecks, archeological findings, religious faith, and far-out legends, the seekers of this booty darn well inspired The Goonies . Now, join filmmakers Tony Altamirano, JB Fisher, and Doug Kenck-Crispin as they probe deeper into recent shipwreck discoveries to expose what’s really hidden at Oregon’s spectacular Neahkahnie Mountain.
response.title: The True Quest for Fabled Treasure on the Oregon Coast
